item.title: About
item.description: About Me Eldhose carry rich experience working in data science. He is good at setting up data infrastructure and good with Python, Bash, SQL, ETL, Numpy, Pandas, Looker, Tableau, Redshift, AWS Services, Google Firebase, Data Pipeline etc. Expertise in Setting up data infrastructure & warehousing Groundwork to log data from web/mobile apps. Building data pipelines, data flow & ETL Analysing data & building dashboards Experience Senior Software Engineer at SpringRole As a senior engineer, I was responsible for the entire data infra for the client Plowz & Mowz.
